title: Junior Frontend Developer
description: I worked closely with the Development team in developing client applications. With my Knowledge of HTML, CSS, and JavaScript and under the supervision of Senior software developers, I participated in writing, debugging, and testing codes

title: Frontend Developer
description: I handled a wide range of responsibilities including designing and implementing user-friendly web interfaces, developing responsive websites using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, and integrating modern front-end frameworks such as React. I collaborated closely with back-end developers, designers, and product managers to ensure seamless functionality and user experience across various devices and platforms

title: Airbeenbee
description: Web app for visualizing personalized Spotify data. View your top artists, top tracks, recently played tracks, and detailed audio information about each track. Create and save new playlists of recommended tracks based on your existing playlists and more.
